Container.Name: TitleCardMaker

Config.Name: Runtime
Run Frequency
Source Directory
Config.Description:
Directory to contain all source images and files<br><br>
Mount to <b>/source</b>

Config.Name: Configuration Path
Config.Description:
Directory to contain all configuration files<br><br>
Mount to <b>/config</b>

Config.Name: Global Preference File
Missing File
Archive Directory
Config.Description:
Directory to contain archives of title cards<br><br>
Mount to <b>/archive</b>

Config.Name: Log Directory
Config.Description:
Directory to contain all log files<br><br>
Mount to <b>/maker/logs</b>

Config.Name: Output Log Level
Tautulli Update List
Tautulli Update Frequency
